description: This file defines a NoteEditor component using LightningJS framework, responsible for displaying and editing notes including UI structure, state management, hooks, watchers, and methods for saving notes.

classes.name: NoteEditor
classes.description: A LightningJS component for editing notes with UI controls, state management, and auto-save functionality.

methods.name: $updateSaveVisuals
methods.description: Updates the save button visuals based on the saving state.

methods.name: $queueAutoSave
methods.description: Queues an automatic save operation after a delay when note content changes.

methods.name: $save
methods.description: Saves the current note content, updating state to indicate saving process.
